title: SJTU Research Team Reveals Structural Origin of Glass Transition (Shanghai Jiaotong University)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Jiaotong University ) October 12 , 2015 Author : Wang Yujie Recently , a team led by Wang Yujie from Department of Physics and Astronomy of STJU published a thesis titled 'Structural origin of hard-sphere glass transition in
